src:
Siap-siap Berburu Pulsa, Makan, Belanja hingga Nonton Murah Rp11
05 Nov 2019, 15:48 by Adinda Purnama Rachmani - detikInet


Foto: shutterstock

Jakarta -
Berburu makanan murah, berbelanja dengan diskon yang menggiurkan hingga nonton bioskop menjadi kegemaran orang Indonesia, walaupun harus merogoh isi dompet untuk membelinya.
Berbagai promo pulsa, kuliner, belanja dan nonton menanti Anda dengan harga yang menggiurkan. Agar tidak menjadi boros Anda dapat menikmati promo dari dompet digital, DANA.
Bukan hanya promo kuliner, belanja dan nonton saja, ada pula promo pulsa dengan harga murah. DANA memberikan keuntungan untuk penggunanya dengan promo #Puas11Rupiah.
Promo #Puas11Rupiah akan dimulai dari 8 sampai 11 November 2019. Bagaimana cara ikutan promo #Puas11Rupiah? Anda bisa langsung ke aplikasi DANA atau download aplikasinya sekarang, lalu temukan Promo Rp11 pada tanggal yang sudah ditentukan. Setelah itu, Anda dapat memanfaatkan promo tersebut untuk jajan makanan dan minuman favorit, beli pulsa, nonton dan belanja.
Merchant yang berpartisipasi dalam #Promo11Rupiah di antaranya: KFC, CFC, CRUNCHÄUS SALADS, Cuppa Coffee, Hongkong Sheng Kee Dessert, Hongkong Sheng Kee Kitchen, Hop-Hop, Kedai Kopi Kulo, Mister Baso, Pho Street, Pho Street Kitchen, Rice Bowl, Tamani Café, Tamani Express, Tamani Plus, The Halal Guys, Bakmi GM, Bari-Uma Ramen, Burger King, Burgreens, Burgreens Express, Caribou Coffee, Carl's Jr., Ce Wei, DairyQueen, Dapur Solo (DS), Domino's Pizza, Fore Coffee, Ichiban sushi, Mama Tina, MammaMia, Negiya, Pezzo Pizza, Sapo Oriental, Senandung Alam, ShuShu, Solaria, Sugakiya, Ta Wan, Walao-eh, Wingstop, dan Yoshinoya. Selain itu, pengguna DANA juga dapat membeli pulsa dengan harga Rp11 dengan menggunakan aplikasi DANA.
Selama #Promo11Rupiah, pengguna DANA juga berkesempatan untuk memenangkan hadiah menarik mulai dari Samsung Note 10+, iPhone 11, Emas 10 gram, GoPro HERO7, iPad Mini, Tiket DWP, AirPods, Nintendo Switch, JBL Flip, Galaxy Buds, dan Saldo DANA.
Jadi jangan lupa untuk cek langsung di sini untuk informasi lebih lanjut tentang #Promo11Rupiah dan nikmati makan, beli pulsa, belanja & nonton Rp11. Download DANA sekarang supaya nggak ketinggalan promo #Puas11Rupiah, 8-11 Nov 2019!

text:
Get ready for Hunting Credit, Eating, Shopping to Watch Cheap Rp11
05 Nov 2019, 15:48 by Adinda Purnama Rachmani - detikInet


Photo: shutterstock

Jakarta -
Hunting for cheap food, shopping with tempting discounts and watching movies are a favorite of Indonesians, even though they have to reach into their wallets to buy it.
Various promo pulses, culinary, shopping and watching await you at a tantalizing price. So as not to be wasteful, you can enjoy promos from a digital wallet, FUND.
Not only culinary promos, shopping and watching alone, there are also promo pulses at low prices. FUNDS provides benefits for its users with the # Puas11R Rupiah promo.
The # Puas11R Rupiah promo will start from 8 to 11 November 2019. How do I join the # Puas11R Rupiah promo? You can go directly to the DANA application or download the application now, then find the Rp11 Promo on the specified date. After that, you can use the promo for favorite snacks and drinks, buy credit, watch and shop.
Merchants participating in # Promo11R Rupiah include: KFC, CFC, CRUNCHÄUS SALADS, Cuppa Coffee, Hongkong Sheng Kee Dessert, Hongkong Sheng Kee Kitchen, Hop-Hop, Kulo Coffee Shop, Mister Baso, Pho Street, Pho Street Kitchen, Rice Bowl, Tamani Café, Tamani Express, Tamani Plus, The Halal Guys, Bakmi GM, Bari-Uma Ramen, Burger King, Burgreens, Burgreens Express, Caribou Coffee, Carl's Jr., Ce Wei, DairyQueen, Solo Kitchen (DS), Domino's Pizza, Fore Coffee, Ichiban sushi, Mama Tina, MammaMia, Negiya, Pezzo Pizza, Oriental Sapo, Natural Humor, ShuShu, Solaria, Sugakiya, Ta Wan, Walao-eh, Wingstop, and Yoshinoya. In addition, DANA users can also buy credit at a price of Rp. 11 using the DANA application.
During # Promo11 Rupiah, DANA users also had the opportunity to win attractive prizes ranging from Samsung Note 10+, iPhone 11, 10 gram Gold, GoPro HERO7, iPad Mini, DWP Tickets, AirPods, Nintendo Switch, Flip JBL, Galaxy Buds, and FUNDS Balance.
So don't forget to check directly here for more information about # Promo11 Rupiah and enjoy eating, buying credit, shopping & watching IDR 11. Download FUNDS now so you don't miss out on the # Puas11Ruta promo, 8-11 Nov 2019!
